Author: throwowoway998881
Text: Yeah it is. Try to get her interested in pickup basketball as sports can really change your mindset. Plus she's tall for a girl.

Author: DiabloDeSade69
Text: Now that you mention it i have a friend who constantly says she needs to gain weight and will openly step on a scale in front of me.   I usually tell her she looks great and at 5" 10 and 127 she does but maybe its a cry for help.
